EmailTemplate.name: PPA LZ Value
EmailTemplate.subject: PPA LZ Value
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom.
LegalZoom is a document preparation service and prohibited from providing legal advice. In order to provide our customers with services that meet their needs while avoiding the high cost of an attorney, we have carefully selected top patent firms to help review and prepare your Provisional Application for Patent.
LegalZoom continues to provide innovative solutions for our customers to make educated decisions and handle their simple legal matters. Our marketing relationship with these registered patent firms makes Provisional Application for Patent process efficient and affordable. Using LegalZoom's established technology and tools, the experienced patent professionals can offer inventors legal advice and counsel at a greatly discounted rate.
Please feel free to contact our {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} if we can be of further assistance. Simply reply to this email, or call us toll free at {!snippetVariable.ip_phone}. Our {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} business hours are {!snippetVariable.ip_hours}.
Thank you for choosing LegalZoom and we look forward to hearing from you soon.
Best regards,
LegalZoom {!snippetVariable.ipbsi_dept_full} {!snippetVariable.ip_phone} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address} {!snippetVariable.lz_website} This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
